name: Real Girls
description:
A comfy, winter, village is subject to a horrific murder. The victim is a user of the app "Real Girl", an expensive gacha game. The suspects: the three girls from the game he plays!

Interview suspects and witnesses, gather clues, and find out who was behind the act.

Controls

WASD - Movement 

E - Interact / Talk to witness 

C - Take photos 

Space - Open Journa

Third Party Assets Used:

Fungus 

Book sfx 

camera shutter
